summary: Alice confirms cloud migration timeline for March 15-17 and assigns tasks: Bob to coordinate with NOC on cutover sequence (sign-off needed by March 1), Carol to document rollback plan by March 10. Team will sync Thursday to review checklist.

action_items.description: Coordinate with NOC on cutover sequence, get sign-off by March 1st
Document rollback plan including database restore and DNS failback steps by March 10
Thursday 2pm sync to review migration checklist
